alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 4:39PM AKST until November 21 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley west of Wasilla. * WHEN...From 3 PM Sunday to midnight AKST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads, and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect periods of light freezing rain to develop in the afternoon to evening hours with the mostly likely areas of ice accumulation from Meadow Lakes to Pt. MacKenzie.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
